Eu Opposes Content Blocking

12 Apr 2002

\nIn a comprehensive show of sense today, the European Parliament voted unanimously against blocking technologies as a legitimate means by which member states can regulate Internet content.\n

\n

\nISPs will instead continue to self-regulate content hosted by their services.\n

\n

\nMore info:

\n

  • Europe elbows Internet content 'blocking'

  • Censorship Guide: Australian law
